name: intend
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 to have as a plan or purpose: [ + to infinitive ] We intend to go to Australia next year. Somehow I offended him, which wasn't what I'd intended. [ + obj + to infinitive ] I don't think she intended me to hear the remark.be intended for The course is intended for intermediate-level students.be intended as It was intended as a compliment, honestly!
More examplesFewer examplesThe president has announced she does not intend to stand for re-election.I made a promise to you and I intend to keep it.How do you intend to deal with this problem?I've heard that she intends to leave the company.I spent much more than I intended to.
